name: Theia Labs
slogan: Computer Vision for the fitness industry
description: Our mission is to develop a seamless and scalable solution that will allow gyms, fitness clubs and athletic centres to automate logging, tracking and analysis of data from athlete's exercise sessions and to unlock the potential of data that historically has been very challenging to access

team.name: Eduard Kim
team.bioHtml: Product person currently exploring applications of Computer Vision. In the past co-founded a social networking platform and a real estate development company.

jobs.title: Technical Co-founder
jobs.description:
Who we are

At Theia Labs we want to make personalised and data-driven fitness accessible to everyone by leveraging Computer Vision to create a truly scalable connected gym experience. Our vision that CV powered cameras will seamlessly extract athlete's data in real time keeping the log of their workouts, performance and achievements

We want to give gym operators the ability to leverage this data to engage and motivate existing members, provide scalable personal trainer experience and win new business through use of cutting-edge technology.

You can learn more about the concept by watching our explainer video:
https://vimeo.com/304442703 

Theia Labs has a strong pipeline of 8 independent gyms/small gym chains looking to pilot our MVP and we are formally advised by one of the most respected academic minds in the Computer Vision space

What is this for

We are looking for smart, entrepreneurial people passionate about fitness, technology and Machine Learning, to join our growing founding team. Potential co-founder, is someone resilient and willing to learn and grow with the business, someone who’s ready to get hands on with technology but also able to make hard business decisions and take risks. 

What’s in it for you
* Become a founding member of an early stage startup
* Significant equity
* Work on something that has truly never been attempted before (we checked)
* Become part of the team of smart, passionate people, willing to do whatever it takes to make a difference

Interested and want to learn more? Drop me an email: ed@theialabs.co.uk
